author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two women lost over eight sovereigns of gold to two chain snatchers under the Subramaniapuram police station limits on Thursday.

Police said that an unidentified person snatched the gold chain of S. Ramani (36) of Avvaiyar Street.

However, she was able to hold on to a portion of it weighing around one sovereign.

The incident occurred around 3 p.m.

At knife-point

In the other incident, M. Latha (47) was robbed of her chain weighing over seven sovereigns at knifepoint while she was walking at Alagappan Nagar around 5.45 pm.

The culprits escaped in a two-wheeler.

Only on Wednesday, a 11-sovereign chain was yanked from a woman, E. Sheeba (35), on the Bypass Road in Perungudi.
title: Two women lose gold chains
